title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate that electrons in the photosystems are boosted to higher energy levels.
The response indicates that electrons in the photosystems are boosted to higher energy levels.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate that an appropriate control is a wild-type (normal) plant of the same species that does not have any mutant chlorophyll biosynthesis enzymes and is grown under identical conditions.

The response indicates that an appropriate control is a wild-type (normal) plant of the same species that does not have any mutant chlorophyll biosynthesis enzymes and is grown under identical conditions.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate that the plant will be able to absorb a greater range of wavelengths, which should increase its ability to perform photosynthesis and thus to survive and reproduce.
The response indicates that the plant will be able to absorb a greater range of wavelengths, which should increase its ability to perform photosynthesis and thus to survive and reproduce.
